summary: Twin boys move to a new home with their mother after she has face changing cosmetic surgery, but under her bandages is someone the children don't recognize.
cast: Lukas Schwarz|Elias Schwarz|Susanne Wuest|Hans Escher|Elfriede Schatz|Karl Purker|Georg Deliovsky|Christian Steindl|Christian Schatz|Erwin Schmalzbauer|Michael Ande|Ruth Leuwerik
keywords: torture|cosmetic surgery|mother son conflict|11 year old|domineering mother
